import React from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Navbar, NavbarBrand, NavbarContent, NavbarItem, NavbarMenuToggle, NavbarMenu, NavbarMenuItem, Button } from "@nextui-org/react"; import { AcmeLogo } from "../AcmeLogo.jsx"; const NavBar = () => { const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = React.useState(false); const menuItems = [ "Business", "Entertainment", "General", "Health", "Science", "Sports", "Technology", ]; return ( NewsGO Home Login Categories
    {menuItems.map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
); } export default NavBar;
